price: 6. Wuxuu Habeenka dhex gashaa maalinta, maalintana dhex gashaa habeenka (macnaha kala badiyaa), wuuna Ogsoon yahay waxa ku jira laabaha (dadka).
arabic: يُولِجُ ٱلَّيۡلَ فِي ٱلنَّهَارِ وَيُولِجُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فِي ٱلَّيۡلِۚ وَهُوَ عَلِيمُۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yūliju al-layla fī al-nahāri wayūliju al-nahāra fī al-layli wahuwa ʿalīmun bidhāti al-ṣudūri
translations: of what is in the breasts
of what is in the breasts
